snippet: Spanish tennis player Rafael Nadal is optimistic he will be ready for the Rio Olympics despite heading into next month's Games having not played a competitive match since May 27 due to a left wrist injury....
lead_paragraph: Spanish tennis player Rafael Nadal is optimistic he will be ready for the Rio Olympics despite heading into next month's Games having not played a competitive match since May 27 due to a left wrist injury.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Confident Ahead of Rio Despite Lack of Match Practice
headline.main: Nadal Confident Ahead of Rio Despite Lack of Match Practice
